Calibrator.NotEnoughData:
There isn't enough data to get an accurate result.
Press back to exit.

AntiPiracy.Title: Declaração Antipirataria do YARG
AntiPiracy.Description: YARG se posiciona firmemente contra todas as formas de pirataria. Não apoiamos nem endossamos a pirataria, pois ela é uma violação da lei de direitos autorais e traz sérias consequências legais. O conteúdo importável da nossa plataforma—desenvolvido para que criadores compartilhem seu trabalho e para fins educacionais—não justifica nem desculpa a pirataria. YARG não utiliza quaisquer gráficos ou músicas piratas e nunca utilizará. Ao jogar YARG, os usuários concordam em não promover ou endossar a pirataria de nenhuma forma através da nossa plataforma. Seguir esses princípios garante uma comunidade que respeita os direitos autorais, a criatividade e os padrões legais. YARG significa "Yet Another Rhythm Game (Mais um jogo de ritmo)" e NÃO uma referencia para piratas.

ConfirmDelete.Title: Delete "{0}"?
ConfirmDelete.Message: Are you sure you want to delete {0}? {1}

EngineInconsistency.Title: Replays estão em Beta
EngineInconsistency.Description: Atualmente, o sistema de replay está em beta, e pode fornecer pontuações/estatísticas inconsistentes, especialmente para guitarra. Nosso objetivo é que os replays sejam confiáveis e precisos, e estamos trabalhando para corrigir esses problemas!

Experimental.Title: Experimental Features Notice
Experimental.Description: The options about to be displayed represent a work in progress. These features are subject to change, may contain bugs, and could even cause major problems if enabled.

BadSongs.Title: Não foi possível escanear algumas músicas
BadSongs.Description: Uma ou mais músicas escaneadas estão corrompidas, formatadas incorretamente, ou criptografadas, e não pode ser carregado no jogo. Para mais informações, por favor, verifique o arquivo localizado em "{0}".

Main.MessageOfTheDay: Welcome to v0.12! v0.12 is a massive update that completely revamps the backend code for the engine, which adds profiles, practice mode, replays, modifiers, customization presets, and much more! If you find any bugs, please let us know on Discord or GitHub. Replays are currently in preview. Replays do not produce 1:1 results to what was actually played and can be inconsistent. This is known and we are working on fixing this for the future. Have fun!

MusicLibrary.Name: Biblioteca de Músicas
MusicLibrary.NoPlayersConnected: No players connected! Go to the profiles menu to connect a player.

Settings.DMXInfo: DMX cue change and post-processing channel values: Cue Change: 0 - No cue 10 - Menu 20 - Score 30 - Intro 40 - Verse 50 - Chorus 60 - Cool (loop) 70 - Warm (loop) 80 - Cool (manual) 90 - Warm (manual) 100 - Dischord 110 - Stomp 120 - Default 130 - Harmony 140 - Frenzy 150 - Silhouettes 160 - Silhouettes Spotlight 170 - Searchlights 180 - Sweep 190 - Blackout (fast) 200 - Blackout (slow) 210 - Blackout (spotlight) 220 - Flare (slow) 230 - Flare (fast) 240 - Big Rock Ending For Strobe and Fog status listen to their respective channels. Post-Processing: 0 - Default Basic effects 4 - Bloom 14 - Bright 24 - Contrast 34 - Mirror 44 - PhotoNegative 54 - Posterize Color filters/effects 64 - Black And White 74 - Sepia Tone 84 - Silver Tone 94 - Choppy Black And White 104 - Photo Negative Red And Black 114 - Polarized Black And White 124 - Polarized Red And Blue 134 - Desaturated Red 144 - Desaturated Blue 154 - Contrast Red 164 - Contrast Green 174 - Contrast Blue Grainy 184 - Grainy Film 194 - Grainy Chromatic Abberation Scanlines 204 - Scanlines 214 - Scanlines Black And White 224 - Scanlines Blue 234 - Scanlines Security Trails 244 - Trails 252 - Trails Long 253 - Trails Desaturated 254 - Trails Flickery 255 - Trails Spacey See YARG docs for more information: https://docs.yarg.in/en/DMX

Experimental.Notice:
IMPORTANT

These settings represent a work in progress. They are subject to change, may contain bugs, and could even cause major problems if enabled.

Button.CopyCurrentSongJsonFilePath: Copy Current Song Json File Path
Button.CopyCurrentSongTextFilePath: Copy Current Song Text File Path

AllowDuplicateSongs.Name: Permitir Músicas Duplicadas
AllowDuplicateSongs.Description: Allows duplicate songs to be scanned and displayed in the library. <color=white>Rescan required if changed!</color>

AudioCalibration.Name: Calibração de Áudio (ms)
AudioCalibration.Description: Calibração de áudio em milissegundos. Use o calibrador para calibrar automaticamente. Valores maiores fazem o áudio tocar mais cedo, enquanto os menores fazem o áudio reproduzir mais tarde.

AccountForHardwareLatency.Name: Account For Audio Hardware Latency
AccountForHardwareLatency.Description: Automatically accounts for the detected playback latency of your audio hardware. This latency may be inaccurate, disable this setting if your audio calibration is negative.

BassVolume.Name: Volume do Baixo
BassVolume.Description: Ajusta o volume do Baixo da música. Somente perceptível em músicas multi-faixa.

ClapsInStarpower.Name: Palmas do Especial
ClapsInStarpower.Description: Ativa as palmas de acordo com a batida durante uso do Especial.

CrowdVolume.Name: Volume da Plateia
CrowdVolume.Description: Ajusta o volume da Plateia da música. Somente perceptível em músicas multi-faixa.

DisableBloom.Name: Desabilitar Bloom
DisableBloom.Description: Disables post-processing bloom (the glowly effect). May increase performance.

DisableGlobalBackgrounds.Name: Disable Global Backgrounds
DisableGlobalBackgrounds.Description: Disables custom backgrounds from your venue folder and shows the ones in songs instead.

DisablePerSongBackgrounds.Name: Disable Per-Song Backgrounds
DisablePerSongBackgrounds.Description: Disables custom backgrounds in songs and shows the ones in your venue folder instead.

DisableTextNotifications.Name: Disable Text Notifications
DisableTextNotifications.Description: Disables text notification on the track such as "100-Note Streak" and "Full Combo."

DMXBlueChannels.Name: DMX Blue
DMXBlueChannels.Description: The eight channels here represent the eight blue LEDs of the StageKit. They will receive on (255) and off (0) commands.

DMXCueChangeChannel.Name: DMX Cue Change
DMXCueChangeChannel.Description: This channel's value will change whenever the lighting cue changes. See the values below:

DMXDimmerChannels.Name: DMX Master Dimmer
DMXDimmerChannels.Description: Channels listed here will be set on game start. Default value is max (255), can be changed in 'DMX Master Dimmer Values' setting below. Useful for fixtures that have a master dimmer channel.

DMXEnabled.Name: Enable DMX Output
DMXEnabled.Description: Enable sending sACN (DMX-over-ethernet) packets over the network to universe 1. Adds 250k bps to network traffic.

DMXFogChannels.Name: DMX Fog
DMXFogChannels.Description: Each channel set here will receive the StageKit fog on (255) and fog off (0).

DMXGreenChannels.Name: DMX Green
DMXGreenChannels.Description: The eight channels here represent the eight green LEDs of the StageKit. They will receive on (255) and off (0) commands.

DMXRedChannels.Name: DMX Red
DMXRedChannels.Description: The eight channels here represent the eight red LEDs of the StageKit. They will receive on (255) and off (0) commands.

DMXStrobeChannels.Name: DMX Strobe Light
DMXStrobeChannels.Description: Each channel set here will receive StageKit strobe commands, either off (0), slow (64), medium (127), fast (191), fastest (255).

DMXYellowChannels.Name: DMX Yellow
DMXYellowChannels.Description: The eight channels here represent the eight yellow LEDs of the StageKit. They will receive on (255) and off (0) commands.

DrumsVolume.Name: Drums Volume
DrumsVolume.Description: Adjusts the song's drum track volume. Only does something if the song is multi-track.

EnablePracticeSP.Name: Star Power in Practice
EnablePracticeSP.Description: Allow Star Power phrases while in Practice Mode.

FpsCap.Name: Limitar FPS
FpsCap.Description: The framerate cap. <color=white>YOU DO NOT NEED TO PLAY YARG ON 1000FPS.</color> VSync recommended.

FpsStats.Name: Exibir Contador de FPS
FpsStats.Description: Exibe o contador de FPS na Barra de Status.

GraphicalProgressOnScoreBox.Name: Barra de Progresso no Box de Pontuação
GraphicalProgressOnScoreBox.Description: Enables and disables the graphical blue outline on the score box that displays the song's progress.

GuitarVolume.Name: Guitar Volume
GuitarVolume.Description: Adjusts the song's guitar track volume. Only does something if the song is multi-track.

HighScoreInfo.Name: High Score Display
HighScoreInfo.Description: Changes what high score information is displayed in the Music Library.

InputDeviceLogging.Name: Input Device Logging
InputDeviceLogging.Description: Prints information about connected input devices to the game's log. Do not enable this unless you are having issues with specific devices, as it can print a very large amount of text for some devices!

KeepSongInfoVisible.Name: Keep Song Info Visible
KeepSongInfoVisible.Description: If enabled, it keeps the song info visible throughout the entire song. Otherwise, it will fade out after 10 seconds.

KeysVolume.Name: Keys Volume
KeysVolume.Description: Adjusts the song's keys track volume. Only does something if the song is multi-track.

KickBounceMultiplier.Name: Drum Kick Bounce Multiplier
KickBounceMultiplier.Description: Controls the amount the track should bounce when you hit a kick note (drums only). Set to zero if you want to disable.

LowQuality.Name: Low Quality Mode
LowQuality.Description: If enabled, the game will disable anti-aliasing, and use lower quality models and textures. This will significantly increase performance.

LyricDisplay.Name: Exibição da Letra
LyricDisplay.Description: Escolha como a o fundo das letras no jogo deve ser exibida.

MasterMusicVolume.Name: Master Music Volume
MasterMusicVolume.Description: Adjusts the song's volume as a whole.

MicrophoneSensitivity.Name: Sensibilidade do Microfone (Db)
MicrophoneSensitivity.Description: Ajusta a sensibilidade do seu microfone em decibéis. Valores menores são mais sensíveis.

MusicPlayerVolume.Name: Music Player Volume
MusicPlayerVolume.Description: Adjusts the volume of the music that plays in the main menu. Set to "0" to disable.

MuteOnMiss.Name: Mute On Miss
MuteOnMiss.Description: Mutes a specific stem when you miss on that instrument. Only does something if the song is multi-track.

NoKicks.Name: Sem Pedal
NoKicks.Description: Remove todas as notas de pedais (Apenas bateria).

NoteStreakFrequency.Name: Note Streak Frequency
NoteStreakFrequency.Description: Sets the frequency of note streak notifications.

PreviewVolume.Name: Volume de Prévia
PreviewVolume.Description: Volume da prévia da música na biblioteca de músicas.

Resolution.Name: Resolução
Resolution.Description: Choose the resolution of your screen. "Highest" is recommended.

RhythmVolume.Name: Rhythm Volume
RhythmVolume.Description: Adjusts the song's rhythm guitar track volume. Only does something if the song is multi-track. In some song formats, this may also be the bass guitar.

SfxVolume.Name: SFX Volume
SfxVolume.Description: Adjusts the game's sound effect volume, such as when gaining a star, or activating starpower.

ShowAdvancedMusicLibraryOptions.Name: Exibir opções avançadas da Biblioteca de Músicas
ShowAdvancedMusicLibraryOptions.Description: Adds advanced settings to the "More Options" menu in the Music Library such as "View Song Folder" and "Copy Song Checksum".

ShowCursorTimer.Name: Tempo de Exibição do Cursor
ShowCursorTimer.Description: How long the cursor will be shown for before hiding. Set to "0" for no hiding (playmode).

ShowFavoriteButton.Name: Exibir Botão de Favorito
ShowFavoriteButton.Description: Shows and hides the favorite button in the Music Library. Songs can still be favorited in the "More Options" menu when this button is hidden.

ShowHitWindow.Name: Exibir Janela de Acerto
ShowHitWindow.Description: If enabled, a box will be shown on your track that represents the "window" in which notes can be hit.

SongTimeOnScoreBox.Name: Exibir Tempo no Box de Pontuação
SongTimeOnScoreBox.Description: Change the song time displayed above the score box. In the examples provided, the song is 5 minutes and 30 seconds long, and you are 1 minute and 10 seconds into the song.

SongVolume.Name: Backing Track Volume
SongVolume.Description: Adjusts the song's backing track volume. These are all of the instruments that are not included in the multi-track.

StageKitEnabled.Name: Enable Stage Kit
StageKitEnabled.Description: Enables sending Stage Kit lighting data to all connected devices capable of reading it.

StarPowerHighwayFx.Name: Star Power Highway FX Mode
StarPowerHighwayFx.Description: Disables visual elements on the highway which appear when Star Power is active

UseChipmunkSpeed.Name: Modo Esquilo
UseChipmunkSpeed.Description: Desativa a correção de pitch ao reproduzir músicas em uma velocidade rápida ou lenta, o que pode levar a alguns... resultados interessantes.

UseCymbalModelsInFiveLane.Name: Exibir Pratos no modo de Cinco Faixas
UseCymbalModelsInFiveLane.Description: Caso habilitado, pratos serão exibidos na segunda e quarta faixa no lugar do modelo de nota padrão (Apenas em Bateria de 5 Faixas)

UseFullDirectoryForPlaylists.Name: Use Full Directory For Playlists
UseFullDirectoryForPlaylists.Description: Use full directory for the playlist sort option in the music library. <color=white>Rescan required if changed!</color>

UseStarpowerFx.Name: Use Starpower SFX
UseStarpowerFx.Description: If enabled, it will add reverb to stems where the player has starpower enabled.

VideoCalibration.Name: Calibração de Vídeo (ms)
VideoCalibration.Description: Video calibration in milliseconds. Use the calibrator to automatically calibrate. This accounts for delays between the game's processing and the actual frame being displayed.

VocalMonitoring.Name: Vocal Monitoring Volume
VocalMonitoring.Description: Adjusts the feedback you hear when singing.

VocalsVolume.Name: Volume do Vocal
VocalsVolume.Description: Adjusts the song's vocal track volume. Only does something if the song is multi-track.

VSync.Name: Enable VSync
VSync.Description: Enables VSync. VSync caps the framerate at your monitor's maximum framerate, and prevents tearing.

PauseOnDeviceDisconnect.Name: Pause On Device Disconnect
PauseOnDeviceDisconnect.Description: Pauses the game if a device taken by a profile disconnects in the middle of a song.

PauseOnFocusLoss.Name: Pause On Focus Loss
PauseOnFocusLoss.Description: Pauses the game if it tabbed out/loses focus in the middle of a song.

ApplyVolumesInMusicLibrary.Name: Apply Volume Settings to Music Library Previews
ApplyVolumesInMusicLibrary.Description: I think this one speaks for itself

RB3EEnabled.Name: Enable RB3E Stage Kit data stream
RB3EEnabled.Description: Enables sending of RB3E style stage kit information packets over the network, for hardware such as StageKitPied

RB3EBroadcastIP.Name: RB3E target IP
RB3EBroadcastIP.Description: Sets the target IP for the RB3E data stream packets. 255.255.255.255 is the broadcast address for the current network

DMXKeyframeChannel.Name: DMX Keyframe
DMXKeyframeChannel.Description: This channel receives the Next (3), Previous (13), and First(23) keyframe calls.

DMXBonusEffectChannel.Name: DMX Bonus Effect
DMXBonusEffectChannel.Description: This channel gets set (2) when a venue bonus effect happens.

DMXDrumsChannel.Name: DMX Drum
DMXDrumsChannel.Description: This channel gets additively set to the current drum notes:  Kick (1), Red (2), Yellow (4), Blue (8), Green (16),  Yellow Cymbal (32), Blue Cymbal (64), Green Cymbal (128).

DMXBeatlineChannel.Name: DMX Beatline
DMXBeatlineChannel.Description: This channel gets set on every measure  beat (1) and Strong beat (11).

DMXPostProcessingChannel.Name: DMX Post-Processsing
DMXPostProcessingChannel.Description: This channel gets set to the video effect happening to the in-game venue. See the values below:

DMXGuitarChannel.Name: DMX Guitar
DMXGuitarChannel.Description: This channel gets additively set to the current guitar notes: Open (1), Green (2), Red (4), Yellow (8), Blue (16), Orange (32).

DMXBassChannel.Name: DMX Bass
DMXBassChannel.Description: This channel gets additively set to the current bass notes: Open (1), Green (2), Red (4), Yellow (8), Blue (16), Orange (32).

DMXPerformerChannel.Name: DMX Performer
DMXPerformerChannel.Description: This channel gets set to the current spotlight and sing-a-long

DMXKeysChannel.Name: DMX Keys
DMXKeysChannel.Description: This channel gets additively set to the current key notes: Green (2), Red (4), Yellow (8), Blue (16), Orange (32).

EnablePlaybackBuffer.Name: Use Audio Playback Buffer
EnablePlaybackBuffer.Description: Buffers audio data by decoding ahead-of-time in chunks. Improves audio stability on low-performance devices, at the cost of added latency on sound effects.

PlaybackBufferLength.Name: Playback Buffer Length
PlaybackBufferLength.Description: The size of the playback buffer, in milliseconds. Larger buffers provide more stability, but further increase the latency of sound effects.

ShowTime.Name: Exibir Horário
ShowTime.Description: Exibe o horário atual na Barra de Status

ShowBattery.Name: Exibir Bateria
ShowBattery.Description: Exibe o nível de bateria na Barra de Status (caso não esteja sendo carregada)

MemoryStats.Name: Exibir Informações de Memória
MemoryStats.Description: Exibir informações sobre uso de memória na Barra de Status

DMXUniverseChannel.Name: DMX Broadcast Universe
DMXUniverseChannel.Description: This is the universe that YARG will send the sACN packet to. Default is 1. Maximum is 65535

ReconnectProfiles.Name: Reconectar Perfis
ReconnectProfiles.Description: At startup, reconnect previously connected profiles.

DMXDimmerValues.Name: DMX Master Dimmer Values
DMXDimmerValues.Description: These are the respective values that the Master Dimmer channels will be set to when YARG starts.

WrapAroundNavigation.Name: Wrap-Around Navigation
WrapAroundNavigation.Description: Allow menus to jump to the bottom of a list when scrolling past the top, or jump to the top of a list when scrolling past the bottom.

FadeLength.Name: Tamanho do Fade
FadeLength.Description: O tamanho do fade da pista. Definir para "0" ir[a remover o fade.

FadeStart.Name: Posição do Fade
FadeStart.Description: The track's fade position. Lower values are closer to the frets. This also controls the track length.

FieldOfView.Name: FOV da Câmera
FieldOfView.Description: The track camera's field of view.

PositionY.Name: Posição Y da Câmera
PositionY.Description: The track camera's Y position (up and down).

PositionZ.Name: Posição Z da Câmera
PositionZ.Description: The track camera's Z position (forward and backwards).

Rotation.Name: Rotação de Câmera
Rotation.Description: The track camera's rotational pitch (up and down).

AntiGhosting.Name: Anti-Ghosting
AntiGhosting.Description: Upon ghosting (or fretting a note that is not present) the player will drop their combo (guitar only).

FrontToBackRatio.Name: Hit Window Ratio
FrontToBackRatio.Description: The hit window's front to back ratio. 0 will bring the hit window fully backwards, 1 will keep it in the center, and 2 will move it to the front.

HitPercentE.Name: Hit Percent (Easy)
HitPercentE.Description: This determines how much of the phrase has to be accurately sung in order to fully fill the accuracy meter, in the Easy difficulty.

HitPercentH.Name: Hit Percent (Hard)
HitPercentH.Description: This determines how much of the phrase has to be accurately sung in order to fully fill the accuracy meter, in the Hard difficulty.

HitPercentM.Name: Hit Percent (Medium)
HitPercentM.Description: This determines how much of the phrase has to be accurately sung in order to fully fill the accuracy meter, in the Medium difficulty.

HitPercentX.Name: Hit Percent (Expert)
HitPercentX.Description: This determines how much of the phrase has to be accurately sung in order to fully fill the accuracy meter, in the Expert difficulty.

HitWindow.Name: Hit Window
HitWindow.Description: The size of the hit window, in milliseconds. Higher values allow notes to be hit earlier/later, smaller values require more precise timing.

HopoLeniency.Name: HOPO Leniency
HopoLeniency.Description: The amount of time a hopo is allowed to take a strum input. Strum after this time and it will overstrum.

InfiniteFrontEnd.Name: Infinite Front End
InfiniteFrontEnd.Description: If on, HOPOs and taps can be fretted before they enter to hit window (guitar only).

IsDynamic.Name: Dynamic Hit Window
IsDynamic.Description: The timing window adjusts in size depending on how close together the notes are. The faster the notes are, the smaller the window becomes (guitar only).

StrumLeniency.Name: Strum Leniency
StrumLeniency.Description: The amount of time a strum can be inputted before fretting the correct note. Fretting after this time will overstrum.

StrumLeniencySmall.Name: Strum Leniency (No Notes)
StrumLeniencySmall.Description: The amount of time a note can be strummed before it enters the hit window and it still receive the strum. Strumming earlier than this will cause an overstrum.

WindowSizeE.Name: Window Size (Easy)
WindowSizeE.Description: Size of the pitch leniency window (in semitones); in other words, how off-pitch the player can sing, and the game will still detect as a correct note, in the Easy difficulty.

WindowSizeH.Name: Window Size (Hard)
WindowSizeH.Description: Size of the pitch leniency window (in semitones); in other words, how off-pitch the player can sing, and the game will still detect as a correct note, in the Hard difficulty.

WindowSizeM.Name: Window Size (Medium)
WindowSizeM.Description: Size of the pitch leniency window (in semitones); in other words, how off-pitch the player can sing, and the game will still detect as a correct note, in the Medium difficulty.

WindowSizeX.Name: Window Size (Expert)
WindowSizeX.Description: Size of the pitch leniency window (in semitones); in other words, how off-pitch the player can sing, and the game will still detect as a correct note, in the Expert difficulty.
